labs.name: CKAD Comprehensive Lab - 1
labs.description: Hands-on exercises covering core Kubernetes concepts, pod configuration, deployments, and services with practical tasks for application deployment in a cluster.

labs.name: CKAD Comprehensive Lab - 2
labs.description: Series of practical tasks on multi-container pods, pod design patterns, configuration, services, and networking in Kubernetes environments.

labs.name: CKAD Mock Exam - Free Preview
labs.description: Free preview with 5 questions covering core CKAD concepts including deployments, ConfigMaps, NetworkPolicies, services, and probes.

labs.name: CKS Practice Lab - Kubernetes Security Essentials
labs.description: Practice essential Kubernetes security concepts including network policies, RBAC, supply chain security, and runtime protection

labs.name: CKS Mock Exam - Free Preview
labs.description: Free preview with 3 questions covering NetworkPolicies, RBAC with minimal permissions, and Pod Security Standards.

labs.name: CKA Practice Lab - Advanced Administration
labs.description: Comprehensive lab covering advanced Kubernetes administration topics including storage, networking, security, and troubleshooting with focus on real-world scenarios, updated with the latest CKA exam curriculum changes.

labs.name: CKA Practice Lab - Core Concepts
labs.description: Practice essential Kubernetes administrator tasks covering cluster management, networking, storage, and security

labs.name: CKA Mock Exam - Free Preview
labs.description: Free preview with 5 questions covering pods, ConfigMaps, storage, deployments, and RBAC basics.

labs.name: Docker Speed Run - Core Concepts
labs.description: Fast-paced practice lab covering Docker fundamentals including images, containers, volumes, networking, OCI, logging, and security best practices.

labs.name: Docker Mock Exam - Free Preview
labs.description: Free preview with 3 questions covering container basics, volumes, and Docker networking.

labs.name: Helm Fundamentals Lab
labs.description: Comprehensive lab covering Helm basics including chart installation, repositories, customization, packaging, debugging, and advanced Helm operations for Kubernetes applications.

labs.name: Helm Mock Exam - Free Preview
labs.description: Free preview with 3 questions covering Helm repository management, chart installation, and release upgrades.
